column4: I like Vista.  It looks nice running in its little cage on my desktop.  There's no door or feeding tray in its cage, but I wouldn't want to actually USE it.
hehehe..I run WinXP now the same way... I so love vm's!
me too.  Thats the only way I run XP now.  My base is Ubuntu 64 with 4 gigs and dual core.
I tride AMD64 Ubuntu for about a month. So many little things not right yet, and no real performance boost I saw, I am on x32 now....
I got an intel and the performance boost is huge compared to my old pc that ran XP.  My virtual XP is called Squeaky Toy (inspired by Monkey Boy).
LOL!! From xp to Ubuntu, major performance boost! from Ubuntu x32 to x64, nothing that I could really tell... xp is almost as fast in its sandbox as it was whenit had the whole pc to itself!
My XP is lots faster viirtually than real.  No way I'm going back.
faster virtual? how do u do that!
not difficult. the old XP was installed ages ago and despite careful management, takes 5 minutes to boot and the same to shut down.  You know how it starts off slow and gets slower over time? ^^
